author: Heping Zhang <phoenix.zhp@gmail.com>
subject_original: [hibernate-users] how can I change the order of the classes handed        to AnnotationConfiguration
subject: how can I change the order of the classes handed to AnnotationConfiguration
message_snippet: hi, I've got a NullPointerException at org.hibernate.cfg.OneToOneSecondPass.doSecondPass when deplor my ejb3 app. And I searched on the web and find out that changing the order of the classes handed to AnnotationConfiguration may work around the prob
first_text_message:
hi, I've got a NullPointerException at
org.hibernate.cfg.OneToOneSecondPass.doSecondPass when deplor my ejb3 app.
And I searched on the web and find out that changing the order of the
classes handed to AnnotationConfiguration may work around the problem.  But
I don't know how to do it? could anyone give me some help? thanks!
first_text_message_without_quotes: hi, I've got a NullPointerException at org.hibernate.cfg.OneToOneSecondPass.doSecondPass when deplor my ejb3 app. And I searched on the web and find out that changing the order of the classes handed to AnnotationConfiguration may work around the problem.  But I don't know how to do it? could anyone give me some help? thanks!
